topics.title: UI/UX Enhancements
topics.summary: Multiple PRs have been merged to improve the user interface and experience, including adjustments to the settings page, scrollbar stabilization, and image display in README files. These enhancements aim to create a more intuitive and visually appealing interface for users.

topics.title: Internationalization Improvements
topics.summary: Recent PRs focused on enhancing internationalization, including renaming locale files and updating translations. These changes aim to improve the localization process and ensure better support for various languages, enhancing user experience across different regions.

topics.title: Bug Fixes and Issue Resolutions
topics.summary: Several bug fixes have been addressed, including issues with tangled stats from the backend and styling problems in README files. These fixes aim to enhance the overall functionality and reliability of the application.

topics.title: Code Refactoring and Dependency Management
topics.summary: Recent merges include refactoring efforts to improve code quality and manage dependencies more effectively. This includes the addition of new dependencies and the use of existing libraries to streamline functionality and enhance performance.

topics.title: Community Engagement and Acknowledgments
topics.summary: Community interactions have been highlighted, including gratitude expressed towards the npmx and e18e communities. This reflects the importance of community support and collaboration in the development process.
